description:
After the collapse of the merger between Namidome Industries and Shiota, it seems like Namidome`s days are numbered. That is, until a man representing another company shows up with an interesting proposal...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Namidome Strikes Back! The Secret Weapon to Resist an Evil Corporation Is... Leather Coral?!
Namidome no Gyakushuu! Akutoku Daikigyou ni Taikou Suru Shudan wa... Umikinoko!?
波止の逆襲! 悪徳大企業に対抗する手段は... ウミキノコ!?
